title: BlackRock’s GIP Teams Up With EQT in Bid to Acquire Power Firm AES
description: BlackRock Inc.’s Global Infrastructure Partners has teamed up with EQT AB in its bid to acquire power company AES Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.
content: BlackRock Inc.’s Global Infrastructure Partners has teamed up with EQT AB in its bid to acquire power company AES Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.
